channel.title: Afro Scape! Amazing Server! Great Features! Download NoW! Source!
channel.description:
This Is My First Release, So Dont Be Too Harsh. This Server, I think, For My First Try, Is Amazing Its A Source, Not A Client. Its Has Loads Of Great Commands And Working Pets, Please Download, I worked Hard On It, Heres Somes Pics:
[img]http://s712.photobucket.com/albums/ww122/kdawiz/?action-view&current=PostPic1.jpg&newest=1[/img]
[img]http://s712.photobucket.com/albums/ww122/kdawiz/?action-view&current=PostPic2.jpg&newest=1[/img]
[img]http://s712.photobucket.com/albums/ww122/kdawiz/?action-view&current=PostPic3.jpg&newest=1[/img]
[img]http://s712.photobucket.com/albums/ww122/kdawiz/?action-view&current=PostPic4.jpg&newest=1[/img]
[img]http://s712.photobucket.com/albums/ww122/kdawiz/?action-view&current=PostPic5.jpg&newest=1[/img]
[img]http://s712.photobucket.com/albums/ww122/kdawiz/?action-view&current=PostPic6.jpg&newest=1[/img]
[img]http://s712.photobucket.com/albums/ww122/kdawiz/?action-view&current=PostPic7.jpg&newest=1[/img]
Download Link - http://uppit.com/v/GK7GX7DG Credits - 85% To Me, 10% To My Bro, For The Pets, 5% To Mopar, For Tuts Ect. It Has Godswords, Minis, Pets Ect. I Think It Has Dragon Claws, But No dragon Pl8 Pets You Have To Drop, And Then Pick Up Again For Them To Work Admin & Mod Shop Staff Zones Pk Areas & Fun Pks Great Fun! Please Download! & Dnt Leach Plz. I Worked Really Hard On This, But If You Really Are Crap At Making Servers, Leach, But Mention Me In Credits.
